Only words with 2 or more characters are accepted Max 200 chars total Space is used to split words, "" can be used to search for a whole string (not indexed search then) AND, OR and NOT are prefix words, overruling the default operator +/|/- equals AND, OR and NOT as operators. All search words are converted to lowercase.
